newsitem.title: USA: Sparta Foods expands distribution network.
newsitem.headline: Sparta Foods expands distribution network.

text.p: Sparta Foods Inc said Friday it had signed a five-year agreement with Marigold Foods Inc for exclusive distribution of Sparta Foods's retail brand Paradiso tortillas. The value of the agreement was not disclosed.

Marigold Foods, based in Minneapolis, distributes refrigerated food products to more than 600 retail grocery stores in Minnesota, Wisconsin, North Dakota, South Dakota, Iowa, Illinois, Michigan and Nebraska.

Joel Bachul, president and chief executive officer of Sparta Foods, said, "This agreement marks the beginning of a significant expansion of our retail line of Paradiso tortillas in Midwest retail markets."
Sparta Foods produces and distributes tortillas and tortilla products to the food service and retail foods industries.
